name: Shh!
description:
It's the year 1721 and you sit in an ostentatious opera house surrounded by elated music. If were not these philistines with no flair for decency. Use the gift of a gentleman and teach them good manners with an energetic "Shh!".

Painting:

Giovanni Michele Graneri (Torino, 1708-1762) - Italia, Turin, Palazzo Madama - Museo civico d'arte antica

Music:

1. Johann Sebastian Bach - Brandenburg No 4 (Gardner Chamber Orchestra)

2. Johann Sebastian Bach - Partita in G major, BWV 829 (Gardner Chamber Orchestra)

CC BY Gardner Chamber Orchestra

Game:

Code: Christiaan Janssen

Idea, concept and SFX: Norman Ritter (C)
